audioText: Nous serons certainement en retard si nous ne partons pas maintenant pour rejoindre nos collègues.
question: Nous serons certainement en retard si nous ne partons pas maintenant pour rejoindre nos collègues.
options: They will miss their colleagues entirely
They will arrive exactly on time
They will be early for the meeting
explanation: The sentence uses 'serons' (future 1st person plural of être) to express certainty that they will be late if they don't leave immediately. The distractors test confusion about the outcome of not leaving now.
